system
Interface Incident

All Known Implementing Classes:
IncidentImpl
public interface Incident

The Incident interface represent the collection of all the incidents stored in the system.

Author:
Antoine Cailliau , Simon Busard

Method Detail

getAmbulanceKindNeeded

java.lang.String getAmbulanceKindNeeded(java.lang.String incidentInfoId)
                                        throws UnknownIncidentException
Return the ambulance kind that is needed by the incident incidentInfoId.

Parameters:
incidentInfoId - The unique identifier of the incident
Throws:
UnknownIncidentException - The incident is not knwown by the system.
Precondition:
incidentInfoId is the id of the incident
Postcondition
return the kind of the ambulance needed by the incident

Set the ambulanceId chosen for the incident.

ambulanceId - The unique identifier of the ambulance

UnknownIncidentException - The incident is not knwown by the system.
Precondition:

Postcondition
the ambulance ambulanceId is now chosen for the incident incidentInfoId

setAsResolved

void setAsResolved(java.lang.String incidentInfoId)
                   throws UnknownIncidentException
Set the incident as resolved

Parameters:
incidentInfoId - The unique identifier of the incident
Throws:
UnknownIncidentException - The incident is not knwown by the system.
Precondition:
incidentInfoId is the id of the incident
Postcondition
the incident incidentInfoId is now considered as resolved.

addIncident

void addIncident(int age,
                 boolean pregnant,
                 java.lang.String localisation,
                 java.lang.String description)
Add a new incident in the database

Parameters:
age - The age of the victim
pregnant - True if the victim is pregnant, false otherwise
localisation - The localisation of the incident
description - The description of the incident
Precondition:
age the age of the victim implied in the incident. age >= 0 pregnant == true iff the victim is pregnant localisation the localisation of the incident description the description of the incident
Postcondition
a new incident is stored in the database
